Name: DopplrVBX
Description: A suite of applets for the smart traveller's phone system.

Name: Highrise Page for OpenVBX
Description: When this page is open, it will notify you in real-time of incoming calls to your devices. It will also redirect you to the caller's profile page in Highrise.

Name: Wikipedia for OpenVBX
Description: This adds Wikipedia functionality to your text call flow. Users can now text a phrase to their OpenVBX numbers and the server will text back the results of the phrase.

Name: Zendesk for OpenVBX
Description: Zendesk tickets will automatically create a ticket for incoming calls to OpenVBX.

Name: Highrise Dial for OpenVBX
Description: Record live conversations to OpenVBX and Highrise.

Name: Highrise Callflow for OpenVBX
Description: Redirect incoming calls based on if they are in Highrise or not.

Name: Highrise Voicemail for OpenVBX
Description: Voicemail are recorded to OpenVBX and Highrise.

Name: Plugin Installer - OpenVBX
Description: Basic uploader for OpenVBX - very beta, used for development quickness for now.
Basic call log for OpenVBX.
Name: Call Log - OpenVBX
Curling - OpenVBX
Description: OpenVBX applet that makes a request to a webserver and reads back the text returned

Name: FourSquare Plugin for OpenVBX
Description: These plugins allow you to control the routing of your call flow based on FourSquare Checkins.  You can filter according to Venue ID or Category.

Name: Chirbit Posting
Description: Create a phone interface for posting Audio snippets to Chirbit.com
Framework for real-time display of contextual business intelligence.
Name: VBX Intelligence
Subscriptions Plugin
Description: OpenVBX Subscriptions plugin adds text message marketing and auto-dialing to OpenVBX. Create opt-in subscription lists to send text updates or automated phone calls using any OpenVBX flow.
Slightly more advanced keyword matching for SMS menus. Lets you choose which applet to run when a keyword is matched. (Great when paired with my Subscriptions plugin!)
Name: Keyword Matching for SMS Menus
Outbound Flows Plugin
Description: Lets you call out with a flow or send messages to someone else from a flow.
Slightly more advanced keyword matching for SMS menus. Lets you choose which applet to run when a keyword is matched. (Great when paired with my Subscriptions plugin!)
Name: Keyword Matching for SMS Menus
Import / Export Flows
Description: The Import / Export Flows plugin allows you to quickly import and export your flows.
Track the current activity in the flow in Google Analytics.
Name: Google Analytics Plugin
Twitter Plugin
Description: Say or reply with the most recent tweet of the specified user.
An applet plugin for OpenVBX that continues the flow by starting another flow or redirecting to the URL of another Twilio app
Name: Transfer Plugin
Caller ID Routing
Description: Route your inbound SMS messages or phone calls based on the caller ID of the incoming message/call.

Click-To-Flow allows a traditional 'click-to-call' form to initiate a call flow. No intermediate code is needed to call the POSTed number and connect it to any given flow. Currently it requires modified OpenVBX source, until unauthenticated plugin requests are supported in the official release.
Name: Click to Flow Plugin

Description: A/B split testing for OpenVBX.
Name: A/B Split Plugin
Cookies Plugin
Description: Store, retrieve, and check a caller's cookies

Name: Polls Plugin
Description: Allows for phone and text message polling.

Name: Automatic Upgrade Plugin
Description: One click updates for OpenVBX.

Name: OpenVBX - Twilio Notification Plugin
Description: Reports Twilio Notifications

Name: Stripe Payments Plugin
Description: Take payments over the phone using stripe.com

Name: FlowTest
Description: FlowTest allows you to test OpenVBX Call Flows - as well as the text-to-speech engine - using the new OpenVBX Browser Phone. Instead of dialing in multiple times as you tweak your flows, you can can now test without even using your phone.
